divs: sighting details was 1968 in turnersvill new jersey about 30 miles out side of andrew's airforce baise.we saw above the tree line ! one glowing ball of light as we walked it moved along above the tree's !(no sound at all!) so when we seen it tracking us !! we ran like hell ! i do not remember much after that ?? but twenty eight year's later while watching the show(sightings) it showed a glowing orb ! and bang i remember!!! paul & i ran to the corner of the street's of whitman dr,&cornwall terr. turnersville new jersey !! a blue light beam came out of orb and froze us right where we stood ! next thing i remember was not being able to move!! ?like frozen(yet i remember (not being cold) next i was on a table flat i raised my head seen paul on the table across the room?? however it was unlike any room i have ever been in before \or since it had no wall's ! a brillent whit,light inside it and two being"s standing over me !! as i looked at my friend paul i seen them !! over him as well, as i got upset the taller one standing over me touched my head ! center with his,?\ i say his because he was the taller of thr two next to me as well there was two over paul one taller one shorter ! the tall on touched my farhead i went lipm as a dish rag ! all of my thought's were calmed ! i ask? thhe taller one over top of me !! who are you !!???? we are you're friend's !! why do you look so diffrent !! we are you're friend's ! why, before i could even get it out?it's nessary !! all communtions where done not with speach! all mentaly done ! long and short of this is i seen paul being turned over, i tryed yelling at paul ! to watch out !?and ahain the taller being again touched my pinial galn ! i went out; and one more time before they dropped us both off ! un harmed- fully clothed ! and last thing i remember was him\ telling me never tell anyone about this !!!! and herer i am telling you !! there is a spot or insision on my lower spine ! and i am 100% sure of what happend ! but it took seeing it on tv. to jogg my memiories of the event,was day when we saw the orb,and night when i was a woke by milltary hellpcopter's ! next morning i go out side ! oh now looking back i did not tell anyone in fact paul an i never talked about it??? we did not remember at that time paul still may not !!?? so as i go out side a tall man with a very black rimed black hat, kinda like policeman.so asked?? what happen last night?? little boy it's not safe, excaped convict,broke out of jail !! now i know this man to be a man in black !!! i had a lost of time ! and mark on my spine and knowlage of how they\live?? no war's ! no food as we know it !all this information was flood into me ! paul was in a jail 29 year's later i wrot to him ! he answered my letter, but did not want to ask him right off the bat!so i wrote asked him an recived a notice he was unabled to be found??
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Gloucester Township
There was one other sighting in Gloucester Township on or around November 12th 1968
Summary: Walking with friend looked up we both seen a glowing ball of light that tracked us as we walked
